name: Max
line: You must be an angel I can see it in your eyes Full of wonder and surprise...

name: Eleven
line: Yeah, he's the Karate Kid. He's so hot, right? I bet he's an amazing kisser, too.

name: Eleven
line: Hey, uh... is Mike a good kisser?

name: Max
line: I don't know. He's my first boyfriend.

name: Max
line: Hey, don't worry about it. Okay? He'll come crawling back to you in no time, begging for forgiveness. I guarantee you, him and Lucas are, like, totally wallowing in self-pity and misery right now. They're like, 'Oh, I hope they take us back.' God, what I wouldn't give to see their stupid faces.

name: Mike
line: What's wrong with me? What did I do wrong? What did I do wrong? What could I have done wrong?

name: Lucas
line: Nothing. Do I have to go through this again?

name: Mike
line: I just don't understand what I did to deserve this.

name: Lucas
line: Nothing. Nothing. That's my whole point. You are the victim here.

name: Mike
line: I know. It's just, why is she treating me this way? I don't know. What did I do wrong?

name: Lucas
line: Mike, stop. Relax. Just relax. Okay? Stop asking rational questions.

name: Mike
line: I know, I know, you're right. Because women act on emotion and not logic.

name: Lucas
line: Precisely. It's a totally different species.

name: Eleven
line: They say we are 'species'. 'Emotion, not logic'.

name: Lucas
line: What else is there to talk about? Tons. Yeah, we're trying to solve the great mystery of the female species.

name: Lucas
line: Dude, you can smell the nacho cheese.

name: Hopper
line: When I say three inches, three... Do you knock? Jeez!

name: Hopper
line: Oh, hey. I'm sorry. I thought that, uh...

name: Max
line: Max wanted to have... a sleepover. Is that... okay?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah. Yeah. Yeah. Yeah. Your parents know about it?

name: Hopper
line: Uh, yeah, it's cool. Yeah. That's... That's really cool.

name: Hopper
line: No, no. Uh, I'll leave. I'll just let you... I'll leave you...

name: Max
line: Holy shit, I can't believe we're really doing this.

name: Max
line: Okay, look, I should just warn you, if he's with a girl or doing something gross, just get out of there right away before you're scarred for life.

name: Max
line: No, I'm just saying, I'm serious. He's really gross.

name: Eleven
line: I don't know. He's... on the floor... talking to someone.

name: Billy
line: Don't be afraid. It'll be over soon. Just stay very still.

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, Will, can you turn down the music?

name: Will
line: Please address me by my full name.

name: Mike
line: Oh, my God. Okay, Will the Wise, can you please turn down the music?

name: Will
line: That is not music. That... is the sound of destiny! I have seen into the future, and I've seen that today is a new day, a day... free of girls!

name: Will
line: A tribe of villagers are under threat from an evil force from the swamps of Kuzatan.

name: Will
line: Is it? Is it early, Michael? Tell that to the villagers crying for your help, the children so frightened, they cannot sleep. Are you truly going to let them perish? Or are you going to come to their rescue and become the heroes you were always meant to be?

name: Mike
line: Uh... Can I at least take a shower first?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, we do. I haven't been stood up like that since Alice Gilbert in the 9th grade.

name: Joyce
line: Yeah, it fell in the night. It lost its magnetism. And the same exact thing happened at my house the day before.

name: Joyce
line: And I thought, 'Okay, that's weird.' Right? Why are all these magnets suddenly losing their magnetism? So, I went and saw Scott.

name: Joyce
line: Scott Clarke. Your child's science teacher? He's pretty brilliant, actually. And I asked him, 'How is this happening?' And he built this magnetic field using an AC transformer and plugging it into a solenoid. And... And with that solenoid, which basically...

name: Hopper
line: Slow down, slow down. I just want to get this exactly right, okay? You stand me up... no phone call, no apology, because you had to go to Scott Clarke's house.

name: Hopper
line: You've outdone yourself, Joyce. You really have. No, you've outdone yourself.

name: Joyce
line: Oh, come on, Hop, you're not even listening to me. Scott was able to demagnetize some of the magnets, and he thinks...

name: Hopper
line: I don't care what Scott thinks! He thinks that a large-scale magnetic field could be built using some sort of machine or... or experimental technology.

name: Hopper
line: He's really brilliant. Is he single too?

name: Joyce
line: What if it's them? To build a machine like this, you need resources. You need scientists, you need funding, tens of millions of dollars.

name: Joyce
line: It can't just be a coincidence, Hopper. It has to be them. It has to be the lab.

name: Joyce
line: Well, then, prove it to me.

name: Joyce
line: Yeah, I wanna go back. Because some magnets fell off your fridge.

name: Hopper
line: I'm sorry. I'm a little busy right now, but maybe we can meet up there, like tonight, like seven o'clock? You know, of course, unless something comes up which, you know, it will.

name: Joyce
line: You know, after everything that's happened, this is no joke.

name: Hopper
line: No, I don't think it's a joke. I think that when I asked you out, I think you got scared. I think you got scared, and now, you're inventing things. You're inventing things to get worked up about so that you can push me away. Because God forbid any of us move on! Because that... that would be... I mean, that would be too much, right, Joyce? You know? That would be too much, wouldn't it, Joyce? Wouldn't it, Joyce?

name: Joyce
line: What the hell are you doing?

name: Hopper
line: No, you're not going back there.

name: Max
line: It's gonna start pouring soon. We should be at the mall or, like, watching a movie or something.

name: Max
line: I believe you saw some super weird stuff, totally, but you said Mike has sensed you in there before, right? So maybe it was just like that. Maybe Billy just... sensed you somehow.

name: Max
line: Yeah, I know, but here's the thing. When Billy is alone with a girl, they make, like, really crazy noises.

name: Eleven
line: Happy screams? What is happy screams?

name: Max
line: It's like... I'm just gonna lend you my mom's Cosmo.

name: Eleven
line: You really want to do this?

name: Max
line: Why do I get the feeling we're gonna find all kinds of wrong in here?

name: Max
line: Ugh! Gag me with a spoon.

name: Max
line: Ice. It's just ice. Probably for his muscles or something. He works out like a maniac.

name: Nancy
line: You really are your mother's son, you know that?

name: Nancy
line: It means... you worry too much.

name: Jonathan
line: So, what exactly are we looking at here?

name: Nancy
line: Is this the Driscoll lady's stuff?

name: Jonathan
line: No. No, see, that's the thing. I mean, listen, I thought she was crazy too, but... She told me Johnson killed Kennedy.

name: Nancy
line: But, it turns out, she's not alone. Blackburn's Supply, Hawkins Farming, the Crawleys, they've all had some supplies go missing, all in the past few days. And it's not just fertilizer. It's pesticides, cleaning supplies, diesel fuel. And that's just from one day of calling around. I mean... there's gotta be more.

name: Jonathan
line: Okay, wait, wait, wait. Let me get this little... story of yours straight.

name: Nancy
line: So, little rodents have gone cuckoo in their furry little minds and they're running around the town of Hawkins, dining out on chemicals.

name: Jonathan
line: I know how it sounds, but...

name: Jonathan
line: I mean, fellas, you gotta admit, it's a hell of a headline, right?

name: Nancy
line: 'Hawkins Rodents Prefer Poison: Nutjob Tells All.'

name: Nancy
line: I think this is... big. Bigger than one article. In fact, I think this has got to be a book.

name: Tom
line: The Mysterious Case of the Missing Fertilizer, a Nancy Drew mystery.

name: Tom
line: Next time a call comes in, do what you were hired for, and let us know, yeah?

name: Nancy
line: Ah... We'll decide what's a story and what's not.

name: Robin
line: Because you're abusing our company policy.

name: Robin
line: Sorry, he can't help you. He's busy.

name: Steve
line: Uh, I guess I don't totally know what I'm looking for.

name: Steve
line: Yeah, exactly. I don't know what an evil Russian looks like.

name: Dustin
line: Tall, blond, not smiling. Also, look for earpieces, camo, duffel bags, that sort of thing.

name: Steve
line: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me.

name: Steve
line: Anna Jacobi's talking with that meathead Mark Lewinsky.

name: Dustin
line: If you're not gonna focus, just gimme the binoculars.

name: Steve
line: Aw, Jesus Christ, whatever happened to standards? I mean, Lewinsky never even came off the bench.

name: Dustin
line: Dude, you are the worst spy in history, you know that? Give me those.

name: Dustin
line: I don't get why you're looking at girls. You have the perfect one in front of you.

name: Steve
line: Seriously, if you say Robin again... No, don't. No. Stop, no, no, no. No, man, she's not my type. She's not even... in the ballpark of what my type is, all right?

name: Dustin
line: What's your type again? Not awesome?

name: Steve
line: Thank you. For your information, she's still in school. And she's weird. She's a weirdo. And she's hyper. I don't like that she's hyper. And she did drama. That's a bad look. And she's in band?

name: Dustin
line: No. Now that you're out of high school, which means you're technically an adult, don't you think it's time you move on from primitive constructs such as popularity?

name: Steve
line: Oh, primitive constructs? That some stupid shit you learned at Camp... Know... Nothing?

name: Dustin
line: Camp Know Where, actually. And no, it's shit I learned from life. Instead of dating somebody you think's gonna make you cooler, why not date somebody you actually enjoy being around? Like me and Suzie.

name: Steve
line: Oh, Suzie. Yeah, you mean, 'hotter than Phoebe Cates.' Yeah, that Suzie. And, uh, let's think about how exactly did you score that beautiful girlfriend? Oh, yeah. With my advice. Because that's how this works, Henderson. I give you the advice, you follow through. Not the other way around, all right, pea-brain?

name: Will
line: Do you guys hear that? It sounds like... thunder. But, no, wait. That's not thunder. It's... a horde of juju zombies! Sir Mike, your action.

name: Will
line: Okay, I attack with my flail. You miss. Your flail clanks the stone, the zombie horde lumbers towards you, and... the juju bites your arm. Flesh tears! Seven points of damage.

name: Mike
line: Oh, no, my arm. Lucas, look, my arm.

name: Will
line: Sir Lucas, the zombie horde roars! Do you fight back or do you run?

name: Mike
line: El's not stupid. It's not my fault you don't like girls.

name: Mike
line: I'm not trying to be a jerk. Okay? But we're not kids anymore. I mean, what did you think, really? That we were never gonna get girlfriends? We were just gonna sit in my basement all day and play games for the rest of our lives?

name: Will
line: Yeah. I guess I did. I really did.

name: Unknown
line: No one in the water until 30 minutes after the last strike. And don't try and argue with me. You wanna get electrocuted, go climb a tree.

name: Max
line: Yeah, we don't care. We're not here to swim. Or get electrocuted. We found this. Does that belong to anybody?

name: Unknown
line: Oh, yeah. That's Heather's. I'll get it back to her.

name: Max
line: We could give it back to her.

name: Unknown
line: You could. 'Cept she's not here. Bailed on me today.

name: Max
line: What is this? You girls want a reward or somethin'?

name: Max
line: Heather. Do you think you can find her?

name: Hopper
line: Hello? Anybody home? We come in peace.

name: Hopper
line: You want to wait in the car?

name: Steve
line: Hello. Yes. I am fine. How are you?

name: Unknown
line: All right, everyone, listen up! I just have one question for you. Who... is ready to sweat?

name: Unknown
line: That's right! Okay! Let's start it nice and easy now. Let's move our thighs. Yeah! Yeah, ladies, warm it up. Bring it down to your hips. Start feeling that burn, everywhere, down in the loins, right? Come on, ladies, show me what you got. Slow now. Just isolate. Ooh, tip that up. That feels good!

name: Robin
line: 'The week is long.' The silver cat feeds when blue meets yellow in the west. 'A trip to China sounds nice if you tread lightly.'

name: Dustin
line: You're not gonna believe who Dustin thought was a Russian.

name: Robin
line: 'A trip to China sounds nice.' A trip to China sounds nice. A trip to China sounds nice. A trip to China sounds nice.

name: Robin
line: 'If you tread lightly.' If you tread... If you tread... If you tread lightly.

name: Robin
line: 'When... When blue and yellow meet in the west.' When blue meets yellow... in the west.

name: Bruce
line: Better get that thing outta here. You don't want it eatin' the tires off your car.

name: Nancy
line: They said they wanted proof, right? So let's give it to 'em.

name: Nancy
line: No, the real rat. Driscoll's rat. You said yourself it looked sick. We can take it to an animal control center, they can run some blood tests on it, figure out what's wrong with it...

name: Jonathan
line: Whoa, Nancy, slow down. Tom didn't ask for proof. He asked us to drop the story.

name: Nancy
line: That's because he didn't believe us.

name: Jonathan
line: You should've thought about that before you talked to them. All right? They're assholes, okay? I get it. But it's just some stupid story.

name: Jonathan
line: It's stupid to get fired over.

name: Nancy
line: No one's going to fire us.

name: Jonathan
line: Look, if you don't want to go, that's fine. Just... give me the keys.

name: Hopper
line: Nobody's home. All the cavities have been filled. I watched 'em do it, Joyce.

name: Joyce
line: I feel like I'm losing my mind.

name: Hopper
line: You're not losing your mind. Not any more than I am. You know, the other day, I almost shot Betsy Payne's dog because it came rushing at me from behind this fence, and I... I swear to God, I thought it was one of those things.

name: Hopper
line: You know that I'm keeping a close eye on things, right? Because it's important to me. It is important to me that you feel safe. That you and your family feel safe. I want you to feel like this can still be your home.

name: Hopper
line: You didn't think I'd find out about that? Gary called me. He said he's fixing up your house to put on the market.

name: Hopper
line: After Sarah... I had to get away. I had to get the hell out of that place, you know? Outrun those, uh... those memories, I guess.

name: Hopper
line: I mean, why do you think I ended up back in this shithole?

name: Hopper
line: But you have something that I never had. You have people that know what you've been through. You have people that care about you. Right here. In Hawkins.

name: Hopper
line: You mean, people like Scott Clarke. That was a joke.

name: Mike
line: Will! Will, I'm sorry, man, all right? I was being a total asshole. Please, can you just come outside and we'll talk?

name: Lucas
line: Hey, Will! Come on, man! We're sorry!

name: Mike
line: Something is coming, something hungry for blood.

name: Mike
line: What if it's the Demogorgon? Oh, Jesus, we're so screwed if it's the Demogorgon.

name: Mike
line: Direct hit! Will the Wise's fireball hits the thessalhydra!

name: Will
line: Stupid. So stupid. Stupid. So stupid.

name: Jonathan
line: Oh, she must not be home.

name: Nancy
line: She's an 80-year-old woman and it's pouring. Where else would she be?

name: Nancy
line: Mrs. Driscoll? It's Nancy. From The Hawkins Post.

name: Robin
line: Look for Imperial Panda and Kaufman Shoes.

name: Dustin
line: They're with that whistling guy, ten o'clock.

name: Steve
line: What do you think's in there?

name: Dustin
line: Guns, bombs? Chemical weapons? Whatever it is, they're armed to the teeth.

name: Robin
line: Well, I think we found your Russians.

name: Hopper
line: This is Hawkins Chief of Police! Come out with your hands up! You hear me? Hands up!

name: Max
line: We didn't mean to... barge in. We tried to knock, but... maybe you didn't hear us over the storm.

name: Unknown
line: I'm sorry, who is this dripping all over my living room right now?

name: Billy
line: I'm sorry. Janet, Tom, this... is my sister, Maxine.

name: Billy
line: What on earth are you doing here? Is something wrong?

name: Max
line: We just wanted to make sure everything was okay.

name: Billy
line: Okay? Why wouldn't it be okay?

name: Heather
line: Well, they're a little burnt, I'm sorry...

name: Billy
line: Heather! This is my sister, Maxine. And, I'm sorry, I did not quite catch your name.

name: Billy
line: El. Now, what is it you were saying, El? You were looking for somebody?

name: Max
line: Your manager. At the pool. He said you guys didn't come in to work today, so we got worried.

name: Billy
line: Heather wasn't feeling so hot today, so we thought we'd take the day off to nurse her back to health. But you're feeling just fine right now, aren't you, Heather?

name: Heather
line: I'm feeling so much better. Do you girls want a cookie? They're fresh out of the oven.

name: Lucas
line: Will! What happened? Are you okay?

name: Unknown
line: Your sister really didn't want to stay?

name: Billy
line: No, she's just not... you know, really a people person.

name: Unknown
line: Well, I just don't like the idea of them out there in the storm like that.

name: Unknown
line: Oh! I told you to slow down on that wine, Janet.

name: Janet
line: Yes, I'm... I'm just... feeling a little lightheaded is all.

name: Janet
line: I'm sorry. Um, if you'll excuse me, I'm just gonna go upstairs and lie down for a bit.

name: Tom
line: Janet? Janet? Janet! Janet! Call 911! Call 91...

name: Heather
line: I'm really sorry about this, Daddy, but it'll all be over soon, I promise.
